statements: SELECT * FROM templates WHERE template_type = 'invoice';
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_id, template_type, template_content FROM templates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM templates WHERE template_type = 'report' AND created_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT template_name, template_type FROM templates WHERE template_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM templates WHERE template_type = 'invoice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_type FROM templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%report%' AND template_type = 'document';
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_type FROM templates WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY template_type ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE template_content IS NOT NULL AND template_type != 'email' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT template_id, template_type, template_content FROM templates WHERE template_type IN ('invoice', 'receipt', 'document') ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates;
SELECT * FROM layouts WHERE layout_id = 2;
SELECT layout_name FROM layouts WHERE layout_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_content, created_at FROM templates ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT layout_name, layout_content, created_at FROM layouts WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT layout_id, layout_name FROM layouts WHERE layout_id = 2;
SELECT layout_id, layout_name, created_at FROM layouts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM templates t JOIN layouts l ON t.template_id = l.template_id WHERE l.layout_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, content FROM templates WHERE id = 2;
SELECT name FROM layouts WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM whiteboards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, layout_id FROM whiteboards WHERE id = 4;
SELECT * FROM templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM templates WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, content FROM templates WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT w.id, w.name, l.name AS layout_name, t.name AS template_name FROM whiteboards w JOIN layouts l ON w.layout_id = l.id JOIN templates t ON l.template_id = t.id;
SELECT t.name AS template_name, l.name AS layout_name, w.name AS whiteboard_name FROM whiteboards w JOIN layouts l ON w.layout_id = l.id JOIN templates t ON l.template_id = t.id WHERE w.id = 3;
SELECT * FROM templates;
SELECT layout_name, last_modified FROM layouts;
SELECT whiteboard_name, created_date FROM whiteboards ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT template_name, template_description FROM templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM templates ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_description FROM templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT layout_name, created_by FROM layouts WHERE layout_id = 1;
SELECT whiteboard_name, owner_id FROM whiteboards WHERE whiteboard_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM templates;
SELECT template_name, category FROM templates WHERE category='marketing';
SELECT template_name, category, content FROM templates ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT layout_title, layout_content FROM layouts WHERE layout_id=1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john.doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT template_id, template_name, category FROM templates WHERE category = 'Business' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.template_name, l.layout_title, u.username FROM templates t JOIN template_layouts tl ON t.template_id = tl.template_id JOIN layouts l ON tl.layout_id = l.layout_id JOIN users u ON l.created_by = u.username;

SELECT u.username, c.category_name, t.template_name, tl.layout_id FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN categories c ON up.category_id = c.category_id JOIN templates t ON c.category_id = t.category JOIN template_layouts tl ON t.template_id = tl.template_id ORDER BY u.username ASC, c.category_name DESC;
